planner_payload.notes: One-file documentation update: add docs/analysis/immune-map.md with a ready-to-render Mermaid Immunity Map template. No other files changed to minimize scope. Template uses commented example nodes/edges so only contentful items are shown, satisfying the hide-empty requirement.
planner_payload.tests: Manual: 1) Open Mermaid Live Editor and paste the snippet; verify it renders with empty groups only. 2) Uncomment A1, B1, C1, D1, E1, F1 progressively and add edges A1->B1, A1->C1, B1->D1, B1->E1, C1->E1, C1->F1; verify edges render correctly. 3) Re-comment nodes/edges to confirm they disappear without errors.
